title: From Technical Founder to Sales Leader: A Community Success Story
excerpt: Meet Sarah Chen, a technical founder who used Graycommit to transform her sales approach and land her first $1M ARR.
content:
Sarah Chen, founder of MLOps Insights, went from struggling with enterprise sales to closing million-dollar deals in just 6 months. Here's her incredible journey.

The Challenge

As a former ML engineer at Google, Sarah could build incredible AI products but struggled to communicate their business value to enterprise customers:

  • Technical jargon alienated C-suite executives
  • Difficulty articulating ROI and business impact
  • Lost deals to less technical but more sales-savvy competitors
  • Imposter syndrome in sales situations

The Transformation

With Graycommit's AI sales coach, Sarah learned to:

  • Translate technical features into business outcomes
  • Handle objections with confidence using real-time battle cards
  • Build relationships with multiple stakeholders
  • Structure discovery calls for maximum impact
"Graycommit didn't just teach me sales techniquesâ€”it gave me the confidence to be myself while selling. I'm still the technical founder, but now I can speak the language of business." - Sarah Chen
author: Community Team
